app.description: Compliant with Common Impact Data Standard Version 3.0
app.link.sampleDataSFF: Basic Tier + SFF sample data file
generics.error.note: The operation was interrupted. Please address the following issue and try again.
import.messages.error.wrongPermissionLev: You don't have permission to create tables in this base, please contact the base owner to give you CREATOR permission.
import.messages.error.emptyOrNotArray: The file data is empty or not a supported file format.
import.messages.error.missingOrganizatio: You can't import without at least one organization.
import.messages.error.missingId: All records must have an @id property.
import.messages.error.invalidJson: Invalid JSON data, please confirm you have the right file, check the data, and try again.
import.messages.error.notValidJson: File is not a valid JSON/JSON-LD file.
import.messages.error.notJson: File is not a JSON/JSON-LD file.
import.messages.warning.unrecognizedFiel: Field {fieldName} in table {tableName} is inconsistent with the Basic Tier of the Common Impact Data Standard. This field will not be imported.
import.messages.success: Your data has been successfully imported.
export.messages.enterOrganization: Enter a name for the exported file:
export.messages.error.missingTable: Table {tableName} is missing. Please create the tables first.
export.messages.error.missingOrganizatio: Please enter a name for the exported file.
export.messages.error.invalidFieldType: Field {fieldName} in table {tableName} is invalid because it is not aligned with the Common Impact Data Standard. Expected type: {expectedType}. Please change the field type.
export.messages.warning.fieldWillNotBeEx: Field {fieldName} on table {tableName} will not be exported.
export.messages.warning.codeListChangesI: Changes made in the predefined code list item with @id {id} in table {tableName} will be ignored.
export.messages.warning.codeListSimilarI:
Record in table {tableName} with @id: {recordId} is similar to the predefined code list item with @id: {codeListItemId}.
Please review the code list item before exporting, or a custom code list item will be exported.
createTables.messages.error.updateFieldT: Please update the field "{fieldName}" on table {tableName} to be of type {fieldType}.
createTables.messages.error.wrongFieldTy: Please delete or rename the field "{fieldName}" on table {tableName}.
createTables.messages.error.renameField: Please delete or rename the field "{fieldName}" to "{newFieldName}" on table {tableName}.
createTables.messages.error.populateCode: Error populating code list for table "{tableName}".
validation.messages.missingRequiredField: Required field {fieldName} is missing on table {tableName}.
validation.messages.nullOrEmptyField: Field {fieldName} is null or empty on table {tableName}.
validation.messages.duplicateFieldValues: Duplicate values in field {fieldName} on table {tableName}.
validation.messages.duplicateUniqueField: Duplicate value for unique field {fieldName}: {fieldValue} in table {tableName}.
validation.messages.warning.nullOrEmptyF: Field {fieldName} on table {tableName} is null or empty.
validation.messages.warning.invalidSelec: Field {fieldName} on table {tableName} has an invalid value.
validation.messages.invalidIdFormat: Invalid URL format: {id} for @id on table {tableName}.
validation.messages.missingTypeProperty: @type must be present in the data.
validation.messages.unrecognizedTypeProp: Table {tableName} is inconsistent with the Basic Tier of the Common Impact Data Standard. This table will not be imported.
validation.messages.warning.wrongReferen: Indicator {indicatorId} does not exist in the Organization table.
validation.messages.dataIsEmptyOrNotArra: Table data is empty or not an array.
validation.messages.multipleValuesWarnin: Multiple values found in field {fieldName} at id {dataId} on table {tableName}. Only the first value {firstValue} will be imported.
validation.messages.multipleValues: Multiple values found in field {fieldName} at id {dataId} on table {tableName}. Only the first value {firstValue} will be exported.
validation.messages.linkedFieldNotFound: {tableName} {name} linked on {fieldName} to item {item} that does not exist in the {linkedTable} table.
validation.messages.invalidPrimaryField: Table {tableName} must have @id as the primary field.
validation.messages.warning.invalidStrin: The field {fieldName} in {tableName} must be text. Please update the value to be a text string.
validation.messages.warning.invalidUrlTy: The field {fieldName} in {tableName} must be a valid URL (e.g., https://example.com).
validation.messages.warning.invalidNumbe: The field {fieldName} in {tableName} must be a whole number greater than or equal to 0.
validation.messages.warning.invalidBoole: The field {fieldName} in {tableName} must be either true or false.
validation.messages.warning.invalidDateF: The field {fieldName} in {tableName} must be a valid date in format YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ.
